Detailed Description

Power management functions of the Companion scanner.

Enumeration Type Documentation

- (enum) eICBarCode_PowerOnStatus

An enumeration of the powerOn status.

The powerOn function that starts the scanner returns one of the following value.

Enumerator
ICBarCodeReader_PowerOnSuccess 

The powerOn command was successful

ICBarCodeReader_PowerOnFailed 

The powerOn command failed due to a synchronization problem

ICBarCodeReader_PowerOnDenied 

The powerOn command was forbidden. This happens when the device is charging on the craddle

Function Documentation

- (void) applyDefaultConfiguration

Apply the default configuration of the barcode scanner.

This method reinitializes the scanner parameters to the default configuration

- (int) getScanTimeout

Get the scan timeout of the barcode reader.

This method is synchronous and blocking. It returns the timeout value in seconds. The returned value is between 0 (no timeout) and 60 seconds.

Returns
int An integer containing the value of the timeout, or -1 if a timeout error occured
- (void) powerOff

Power off the scanner.

The barcode scanner should be turned off when not in use to save the device's battery life.

- (int) powerOn

Power on the scanner.

This method powers on the scanner of the Companion terminal. It may take up to 1 second for this function to return. The powerOn request is not always successful. It may fail if there is any synchronization problem or when the Companion is being charged on the craddle.
After the scanner is started, the configurationRequest callback is called to invite the user application to apply its scanner configuration (set single or multi-scanning, choose the barcode symbologies, choose the imager mode 1D/2D, ...).

Returns
One of the constants defined in eICBarCode_PowerOnStatus according to whether the call was successful or not.
- (void) setScanTimeout: (int)  timeout

Defines the delay after which the scanner will abort the barcode decoding.

Parameters
timeoutThe new scan timeout to apply.
- (void) softReset

Soft-Reset the barcode scanner.

The soft-reset reinitializes the scanner parameters
